Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command.
EnumEntry.Description: Frames are captured continuously until stopped with the AcquisitionStop command. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SingleFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: One frame is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: One frame is captured. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off).

EnumEntry.Name: MultiFrame
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured.
EnumEntry.Description: The number of frames specified by AcquisitionFrameCount is captured. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off).

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: Starts the Acquisition of the device. The number of frames captured is specified by AcquisitionMode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (DeviceTemperatureExceeded = True) OR (DeviceTemperatureUnderrun = True).

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: Stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame. It is mainly used when AcquisitionMode is Continuous but can be used in any acquisition mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Command.Name: AcquisitionAbort
Command.Description: Aborts the Acquisition immediately. This will end the capture without completing the current Frame or waiting on a trigger. If no Acquisition is in progress, the command is ignored. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Float.Name: AcquisitionFrameRate
Float.ToolTip: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured.
Float.Description: Controls the acquisition rate (in Hertz) at which the frames are captured. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionFrameRateEnable = False).

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionStatusSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the internal acquisition signal to read using AcquisitionStatus. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionActive
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently doing an acquisition of one or many frames. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: AcquisitionTriggerWait
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames.
EnumEntry.Description: Device is currently waiting for a trigger for the capture of one or many frames. AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionStatus
Boolean.ToolTip: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector.
Boolean.Description: Reads the state of the internal acquisition signal selected using AcquisitionStatusSelector. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameCount
Integer.ToolTip: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode.
Integer.Description: Number of frames to acquire in MultiFrame Acquisition mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: ((AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (AcquisitionMode != Multi Frame)).

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the type of trigger to configure.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the type of trigger to configure. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects a trigger starting the capture of one frame. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
Enumeration.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (ExposureMode = TriggerWidth).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the selected trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enable the selected trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Enable the selected trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

Command.Name: TriggerSoftware
Command.Description: Generates an internal trigger. TriggerSource must be set to Software. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerSource
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No trigger source is active.
EnumEntry.Description: No trigger source is active. AVAILABLE: (ExposureMode != TriggerWidth).

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: All trigger sources are active.
EnumEntry.Description: All trigger sources are active. AVAILABLE: (ExposureMode != TriggerWidth).

EnumEntry.Name: Action1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which Action command to use as internal source for the trigger. AVAILABLE: (ExposureMode != TriggerWidth).

EnumEntry.Name: Software
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger source will be generated by software using the TriggerSoftware command. AVAILABLE: (ExposureMode != TriggerWidth).

EnumEntry.Name: Line0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line2
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Line3
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which physical line (or pin) and associated I/O control block to use as external source for the trigger signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter1End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Counter2End
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies which of the Counter signal to use as internal source for the trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerActivation
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: RisingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the rising edge of the source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FallingEdge
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies that the trigger is considered valid on the falling edge of the source signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: TriggerOverlap
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the type trigger overlap permitted with the previous frame. This defines when a valid trigger will be accepted (or latched) for a new frame. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadOut
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period.
EnumEntry.Description: Trigger is accepted immediately after the exposure period. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: No trigger overlap is permitted.
EnumEntry.Description: No trigger overlap is permitted. AVAILABLE: Always.

Float.Name: TriggerDelay
Float.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
Float.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: ExposureMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
Enumeration.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

EnumEntry.Name: Timed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Timed exposure.
EnumEntry.Description: Timed exposure. The exposure duration time is set using the ExposureTime or ExposureAuto features and the exposure starts with the FrameStart or LineStart (see Figure 53 and Figure 54). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerWidth
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration.
EnumEntry.Description: Uses the width of the current Frame or Line trigger signal(s) pulse to control the exposure duration. Note that if the Frame or Line TriggerActivation is RisingEdge or LevelHigh, the exposure duration will be the time the trigger stays High. If TriggerActivation is FallingEdge or LevelLow, the exposure time will last as long as the trigger stays Low. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (HDREnable = Off) AND (TriggerMode = On) AND (TriggerSource = Input Line) AND (ExposureAuto = Off).

Float.Name: ExposureTime
Float.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
Float.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (ExposureMode = TriggerWidth) OR ((ExposureAuto != Off) AND (SequencerConfigurationMode = Off)).

Boolean.Name: ShortExposureTimeEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if short exposure time should be supported.
Boolean.Description: Controls if short exposure time should be supported. Note if this feature is enabled one cannot use the sequencer. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (ExposureTime is in the Short ExposureTime range).

Enumeration.Name: ExposureAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic exposure mode when ExposureMode is Timed. The exact algorithm used to implement this control is device-specific. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is user controlled using ExposureTime. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is adapted once by the device. Once it has converged, it returns to the Off state. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (ExposureMode = Timed) AND (AutofeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BrightnessAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range.
EnumEntry.Description: Exposure duration is constantly adapted by the device to maximize the dynamic range. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (ExposureMode = Timed) AND (AutofeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BrightnessAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

Boolean.Name: AcquisitionFrameRateEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate.
Boolean.Description: Controls if the AcquisitionFrameRate feature is writable and used to control the acquisition rate. Otherwise, the acquisition rate is implicitly controlled by the combination of other features like ExposureTime, etc... AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: ReadoutMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Specifies the operation mode of the readout for the acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: Specifies the operation mode of the readout for the acquisition. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

EnumEntry.Name: Sequential
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sequential ReadoutMode
EnumEntry.Description: Sequential ReadoutMode AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Overlapped
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Overlapped ReadOutMode
EnumEntry.Description: Overlapped ReadOutMode AVAILABLE: (HDREnable = Off).

Integer.Name: ActionDeviceKey
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.
Integer.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands. The device internal assertion of an action signal is only authorized if the ActionDeviceKey and the action device key value in the protocol message are equal. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: ActionSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply.
Integer.Description: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupMask
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
Integer.Description: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupKey
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.
Integer.Description: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Enumeration.Name: GainSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Gain is controlled by the various Gain features. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On).

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to all channels or taps. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Red
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the red channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreenRed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the green red channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the green red channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GreenBlue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the green blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the green blue channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Blue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain will be applied to the blue channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain will be applied to the blue channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

Float.Name: Gain
Float.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (((GainSelector = All) AND (SequencerConfigurationMode = Off)) AND (GainAuto != Off)) OR ((GainSelector != All) AND ((BalanceWhiteAuto != Off) OR (ColorTransformationAuto != Off))).

Enumeration.Name: GainAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the automatic gain control (AGC) mode. The exact algorithm used to implement AGC is device-specific. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is User controlled using Gain.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is User controlled using Gain. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state. AVAILABLE: ((SequencerMode = Off) AND (GainSelector = All)) AND (AutofeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BrightnessAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Gain is constantly adjusted by the device. AVAILABLE: ((SequencerMode = Off) AND (GainSelector = All)) AND (AutofeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BrightnessAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

Enumeration.Name: BlackLevelSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which Black Level is controlled by the various Black Level features. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: All
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps.
EnumEntry.Description: Black Level will be applied to all channels or taps. AVAILABLE: Always.

Float.Name: Gamma
Float.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
Float.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity. This is typically used to compensate for non-linearity of the display system (such as CRT). AVAILABLE: (LUTContent != UserdefinedLUT). LOCKED: (LUTEnable = False).

Float.Name: BlackLevel
Float.ToolTip: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value.
Float.Description: Controls the analog black level as an absolute physical value. This represents a DC offset applied to the video signal. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

Enumeration.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is off.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is off. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (AutofeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BalanceWhiteAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: White balancing is constantly adjusted by the device. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (AutofeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BalanceWhiteAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

Float.Name: AutoFeatureCycleTime
Float.ToolTip: Cycle Time of auto feature control loop in milliseconds for once and continuous mode.
Float.Description: Cycle Time of auto feature control loop in milliseconds for once and continuous mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Enumeration.Name: AutoFeatureRegionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the Region of interest to control.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the Region of interest to control. The RegionSelector feature allows devices that are able to extract multiple regions out of an image, to configure the features of those individual regions independently. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control the region for BalanceWhiteAuto and ColorTransformationAuto algorithm.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the region for BalanceWhiteAuto and ColorTransformationAuto algorithm. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BrightnessAuto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control the region for GainAuto and ExposureAuto algorithm.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the region for GainAuto and ExposureAuto algorithm. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: AutoFeatureRegionReference
Enumeration.ToolTip: The Reference Region of interest.
Enumeration.Description: The Reference Region of interest. The Auto Feature Region is part of this region and all Auto Feature Region features are refs to this Reference Region. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The selected Auto Feature Region refer to Region 0.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected Auto Feature Region refs to Region 0. AVAILABLE: Always.

Enumeration.Name: AutoFeatureRegionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the mode of the selected Auto Feature Region.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the mode of the selected Auto Feature Region. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: All settings of the selected AutoFeature ROI are automatically equal to the selected AutoFeatureRegionReference.
EnumEntry.Description: All settings of the selected AutoFeature ROI are automatically equal to the selected AutoFeatureRegionReference. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: On
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The settings of the selected AutoFeature ROI are user defined.
EnumEntry.Description: The settings of the selected AutoFeature ROI are user defined. The AutoFeature is useable only if the AutoFeature ROI fits into the AutoFeatureregionReference of the AutoFeature. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: AutoFeatureWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the selected Auto Feature Region (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the selected Auto Feature Region (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (AutoFeatureRegionMode[AutoFeatureRegionSelector] = Off).

Integer.Name: AutoFeatureHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the selected Auto Feature Region (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the selected Auto Feature Region (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (AutoFeatureRegionMode[AutoFeatureRegionSelector] = Off).

Integer.Name: AutoFeatureOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the Auto Feature Region (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the Auto Feature Region (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (AutoFeatureRegionMode[AutoFeatureRegionSelector] = Off).

Integer.Name: AutoFeatureOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the Auto Feature Region (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the Auto Feature Region (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (AutoFeatureRegionMode[AutoFeatureRegionSelector] = Off).

Enumeration.Name: ChunkBinningSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control the sensor binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the sensor binning.

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning.

Integer.Name: ChunkBinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image.

Integer.Name: ChunkBinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkBinningVerticalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.

Enumeration.Name: ChunkBinningHorizontalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.

Command.Name: CounterReset
Command.ToolTip: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it.
Command.Description: Does a software reset of the selected Counter and starts it. The counter starts counting events immediately after the reset unless a Counter trigger is active. CounterReset can be used to reset the Counter independently from the CounterResetSource. To disable the counter temporarily, set CounterEventSource to Off. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

Integer.Name: CounterValue
Integer.ToolTip: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter.
Integer.Description: Reads or writes the current value of the selected Counter. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

Integer.ToolTip: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command.
Integer.Description: Reads the value of the selected Counter when it was reset by a trigger or by an explicit CounterReset command. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: CounterDuration

Integer.Description: Sets the duration (or number of events) before the CounterEnd event is generated. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On).

Boolean.Name: HDREnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the High Dynamic Range mode.
Boolean.Description: Enables the High Dynamic Range mode. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (ExposureMode = TriggerWidth) OR (For OSP sensors only: ReadOutMode = Overlapped).

Integer.Name: HDRIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of HDR element to access.
Integer.Description: Index of HDR element to access. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: HDRPotentialAbs
Integer.ToolTip: HDR Potential Abs.
Integer.Description: HDR Potential Abs. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: HDRExposureRatio
Integer.ToolTip: HDR Exposure Ratio.
Integer.Description: HDR Exposure Ratio. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Float.Name: HDRExposureRatioPercent
Float.ToolTip: HDR Exposure Ratio Percent.
Float.Description: HDR Exposure Ratio Percent. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: Effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective width of the sensor in pixels. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: Effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: Effective height of the sensor in pixels. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: WidthMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum width of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum width of the image (in pixels). The dimension is calculated after horizontal binning, decimation or any other function changing the horizontal dimension of the image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: HeightMax
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum height of the image (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Maximum height of the image (in pixels). This dimension is calculated after vertical binning, decimation or any other function changing the vertical dimension of the image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
Integer.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True).

Enumeration.Name: BinningSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features.
Enumeration.Description: Selects which binning engine is controlled by the BinningHorizontal and BinningVertical features. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Sensor
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected features will control the sensor binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected features will control the sensor binning. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Region0
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning.
EnumEntry.Description: Selected feature will control the region 0 binning. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: BinningHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of horizontal photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the horizontal resolution (width) of the image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Enumeration.Name: BinningHorizontalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode to use to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningHorizontal is used. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Name: BinningVertical
Integer.ToolTip: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together.
Integer.Description: Number of vertical photo-sensitive cells to combine together. This increases the intensity (or signal to noise ratio) of the pixels and reduces the vertical resolution (height) of the image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Enumeration.Name: BinningVerticalMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the mode used to combine horizontal photo-sensitive cells together when BinningVertical is used. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: Sum
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be added, resulting in increased sensitivity. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Average
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio.
EnumEntry.Description: The response from the combined cells will be averaged, resulting in increased signal/noise ratio. AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: ReverseX
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The AOI is applied before the flipping. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (PixelFormat is a Bayer format) OR (ReverseX, ReverseY not allowed together and ReverseY = 1).

Boolean.Name: ReverseY
Boolean.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
Boolean.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The AOI is applied before the flipping. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (PixelFormat is a Bayer format) OR (ReverseX, ReverseY not allowed together and ReverseX = 1).

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
Enumeration.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (SequencerMode = On) OR (AcquisitionStatus[Acquisition Active] = True) OR (TLParamsLocked = 1).

EnumEntry.Name: Mono8

EnumEntry.Description: Color transformation is user controlled using the various Colortransformation features. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Once
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Color transformation is automatically adjusted once by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Color transformation is automatically adjusted once by the device. Once it has converged, it automatically returns to the Off state. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (AutofeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BalanceWhiteAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

EnumEntry.Name: Continuous
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Color transformation is constantly adjusted by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Color transformation is constantly adjusted by the device. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = Off) AND (AutofeatureROI[AutoFeatureRegionSelector = BalanceWhiteAuto] INSIDE ImageFormatControl ROI).

Enumeration.Description: Controls if the sequencer mechanism is active. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (ShortExposureTimeEnable = On) OR (HDREnable = True) OR (SequencerConfigurationMode = On) OR (BalanceWhiteAuto != Off) OR (GainAuto != Off) OR (ExposureAuto != Off) OR (ColorTransformationAuto != Off).

EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the sequencer.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the sequencer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Off
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Disables the sequencer.
EnumEntry.Description: Disables the sequencer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Off

EnumEntry.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter). AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Description: Enables the selected feature and make it active in all the sequencer sets. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Description: Contains the currently active sequencer set. AVAILABLE: (SequencerMode = On). LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Description: Sets the initial/start sequencer set, which is the first set used within a sequencer. AVAILABLE: (SequencerConfigurationMode = On). LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Description: Starts with the reception of the Counter End. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: Specifies Line 0 as external trigger source. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Description: Specifies Line 1 as external trigger source. AVAILABLE: Always.

Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds. AVAILABLE: (DeviceEventChannelCount > 0). LOCKED: Never.

Integer.ToolTip: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the port of the selected channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the port from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.ToolTip: Sends a test packet.
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1) OR (IP reassembly is not supported by the device).

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size, in bytes, to send on the selected channel for a GVSP transmitter or specifies the maximum packet size supported by a GVSP receiver. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream.
Integer.Description: Controls the destination IP address of the selected stream channel to which a GVSP transmitter must send data stream or the destination IP address from which a GVSP receiver may receive data stream. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: (TLParamsLocked = 1).

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: GevSCFTD
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each block (image) for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each block (image) for this stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Boolean.Name: GevSCCFGUnconditionalStreaming
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages).
Boolean.Description: Enables the camera to continue to stream, for this stream channel, if its control channel is closed or regardless of the reception of any ICMP messages (such as destination unreachable messages). AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceTemperatureStatusTransition
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Temperature threshold for selected status transition in degrees Celsius (C).
EnumEntry.Description: Temperature threshold for selected status transition in degrees Celsius (C). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureTime
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the Exposure time when ExposureMode is Timed and ExposureAuto is Off. This controls the duration where the photosensitive cells are exposed to light. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FixedPatternNoiseCorrection
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Fixed pattern noise correction.
EnumEntry.Description: Fixed pattern noise correction. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: FrameCounter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the frame counter, which is part of the chunk data too.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the frame counter, which is part of the chunk data too. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gain
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the selected gain as an absolute physical value. This is an amplification factor applied to the video signal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GevSCFTD
EnumEntry.ToolTip: This feature indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each block (image) for this stream channel.
EnumEntry.Description: This feature indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each block (image) for this stream channel. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Height
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Height of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LineDebouncerHighTimeAbs
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from low to high.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from low to high. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LineDebouncerLowTimeAbs
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from high to low.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the absolute value of the selected line debouncer time in microseconds for switch from high to low AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LineInverter
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the inversion of the signal of the selected input or output Line. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LineSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects which internal acquisition or I/O source signal to output on the selected Line. LineMode must be Output. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LUTEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Activates the selected LUT.
EnumEntry.Description: Activates the selected LUT. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LUTValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector.
EnumEntry.Description: Returns the Value at entry LUTIndex of the LUT selected by LUTSelector. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LUTContent
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Describes the content of the selected LUT.
EnumEntry.Description: Describes the content of the selected LUT. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: OffsetX
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Horizontal offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: OffsetY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Vertical offset from the origin to the region of interest (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: PixelFormat
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Format of the pixels provided by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Format of the pixels provided by the device. It represents all the information provided by PixelCoding, PixelSize, PixelColorFilter combined in a single feature. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ReadoutMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the operation mode of the readout for the acquisition.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the operation mode of the readout for the acquisition. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ReverseX
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Flip horizontally the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ReverseY
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Flip vertically the image sent by the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Flip vertically the image sent by the device. The Region of interest is applied after the flipping. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SensorShutterMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the shutter mode of the device.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the shutter mode of the device. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerSetNext
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the next sequencer set.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the next sequencer set. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerSetStart
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the initial/start sequencer set, which is the first set used within a sequencer.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the initial/start sequencer set, which is the first set used within a sequencer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerTriggerActivation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the sequencer trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the sequencer trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: SequencerTriggerSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the sequencer trigger source.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input line to use as the sequencer trigger source. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ShortExposureTimeEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if short exposure time should be supported.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if short exposure time should be supported. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TestPattern
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the type of test pattern that is generated by the device as image source. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerDelay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the delay to apply at the reception of a trigger before starting the Timer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerDuration
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the duration (in microseconds) of the Timer pulse. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerTriggerActivation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Timer.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the activation mode of the trigger to start the Timer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TimerTriggerSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the source of the trigger to start the Timer. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerActivation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the activation mode of the trigger. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerDelay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the delay in microseconds (us) to apply after the trigger reception before activating it. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls if the selected trigger is active.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls if the selected trigger is active. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: TriggerSource
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source.
EnumEntry.Description: Specifies the internal signal or physical input Line to use as the trigger source. The selected trigger must have its TriggerMode set to On. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutputValue
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the value of the bit selected by UserOutputSelector. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: UserOutputValueAll
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the value of all the bits of the User Output register. It is subject to the UserOutputValueAllMask. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Width
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels).
EnumEntry.Description: Width of the image provided by the device (in pixels). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ExposureMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter).
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the operation mode of the Exposure (or shutter). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: Gamma
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the gamma correction of pixel intensity. This is typically used to compensate for non-linearity of the display system (such as CRT). AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: BalanceWhiteAuto
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the mode for automatic white balancing between the color channels. The white balancing ratios are automatically adjusted. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ChunkEnable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image.
EnumEntry.Description: Enables the inclusion of the selected Chunk data in the payload of the image. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: ActionDeviceKey
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.
EnumEntry.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands. The device internal assertion of an action signal is only authorized if the ActionDeviceKey and the action device key value in the protocol message are equal. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: GevSCPD
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
EnumEntry.Description: Controls the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: DeviceLinkThroughputLimit
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link.
EnumEntry.Description: Limits the maximum bandwidth of the data that will be streamed out by the device on the selected Link. If necessary, delays will be uniformly inserted between transport layer packets in order to control the peak bandwidth. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: EventNotification
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Activate or deactivate the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event.
EnumEntry.Description: Activate or deactivate the notification to the host application of the occurrence of the selected Event. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMMode
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Selects the PWM mode of the selected output line.
EnumEntry.Description: Selects the PWM mode of the selected output line. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMMaxDuration
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the maximum duration in microseconds.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the maximum duration in microseconds. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMDuration
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sets the duration in microseconds.
EnumEntry.Description: Sets the duration in microseconds. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMMaxDutyCycle
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offers the maximal duty cycle in percent.
EnumEntry.Description: Offers the maximal duty cycle in percent. AVAILABLE: Always.

EnumEntry.Name: LinePWMDutyCycle
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Offers the duty cycle in percent.
EnumEntry.Description: Offers the duty cycle in percent. AVAILABLE: Always.

Boolean.Name: UserSetFeatureEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the selected feature and make it active in all the UserSets.
Boolean.Description: Enables the selected feature and make it active in all the UserSets. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Boolean.Name: UserSetDataEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the feature UserSetData.
Boolean.Description: Enables the feature UserSetData. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: UserSetStartAddressSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selctor for the Start Address of a single UserSet where the UserSet Data can read from.
Integer.Description: Selctor for the Start Address of a single UserSet where the UserSet Data can read from. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Register.Name: UserSetData
Register.ToolTip: Data of a UserSet. Start Address is selected by feature User Set Start Address Selector.
Register.Description: Data of a UserSet. Start Address is selected by feature User Set Start Address Selector. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Boolean.Name: ImageDataEnable
Boolean.ToolTip: Enables the feature ImageData.
Boolean.Description: Enables the feature ImageData. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Register.Name: ImageData
Register.Description: Data of an Image. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.

Integer.Name: CustomDataSelector
Integer.ToolTip: The feature selects the index of the custom data byte array.
Integer.Description: The feature selects the index of the custom data byte array. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: CustomData
Integer.ToolTip: The feature holds one byte of custom special data.
Integer.Description: The feature holds one byte of custom special data. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Never.

Integer.Name: MemoryMaxBlocks
Integer.ToolTip: Maximum count of available memory blocks.
Integer.Description: Maximum count of available memory blocks. It depends on partial scan features, pixelformat and selected acquisitionformat. AVAILABLE: Always. LOCKED: Read Only feature.
